response.original_title: The Comedy Mixtape with Pax Assadi
response.overview: South Auckland’s unmissable showcase of Aotearoa’s blazing hot comedic talent.  Curated and MC’d by Pax Assadi (Raised by Refugees and host of the 2020 Best Foods Christmas Comedy Gala), one of NZ's strongest comedic voices, and headlined by the self-proclaimed “humble king of comedy”, Tofiga Fepulea’i, The Comedy Mixtape features a lineup of some of comedy’s biggest stars and hottest emerging talent.  This sensational stand-up showcase brings a huge night of laughs to South Auckland, with the freshest comedians on the block hitting the stage with some of comedy’s household names.
response.title: The Comedy Mixtape with Pax Assadi
